descriptionHtml:
REQ-Dawnguard,Hearthfire,Dragonborn and latest patch

Hours played: 290 hours
Race-Imperial,werewolf
Save size- 14mb
- No mods were involved
- All achievements through this save

practically 100% of progress. Save from the few bugged misc that are currently in the journal, pretty much everything has been completed. Main player home is in Windhelm
Hjerim.

Tell me in the comment section if i missed anything!

- Dawnguard has been completed
- Dragonborn has been completed
- Hearthfire all 3 houses build and furnished
- All houses fully furnished
- You're the Thieves' Guild leaders
- You're the leader of The Companions
- The Blades are fully established and with a full membership
- You're the leader of the Dark Brotherhood
- You're the Archmage of The College of Winterhold
- All master spells (Destruction, Illusion etc.) acquired
- You're a Nightingale
- You're a Thane in every Hold
- Houses are all fully furnished
- Bard of Bards College
- All of the daedric quests are finished
- All Stones of Barenziah collected and the crown repaired
- All locations found
- All Vampire perks unlocked
- All Werewolf perks unlocked
- All ingredient effects known
- All Dragonborn locations found
- All dragon shouts unlocked
- All Deathbrand treasure found
- Collected all black books
- Collected all dragon priest masks
- Defeated karstaag
- Uncovered the secrets of Kagrumez
- Unlocked the bow of the stag prince its full potential
- Collected all 4 unique Werewolf rings
- Sided with imperials and took over windhelm
- Sided with Vampires(Dawnguard)
- Collected most unique weapons and armor
- All books collected
- Collected all keys
- Defeated Ebonywarrior
- All Enchantments known
-All hidden treasures found
-Collected all bugs in a jar
- other things i forgot to mention
author: DodderySmash
